channel.title: How to make droping items vanish or not appear?
channel.description: How do i make droping items vanish or not appear, i want this to happen to stop Xfers/drop trades...

item.title: How to make droping items vanish or not appear?
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

hmm, well cant it be like a 3k drop limit? or sumthing?
say if they droped their cash like 10k then the could either pick it up or leave it, but is not visiable to others?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make droping items vanish or not appear?

item.title: How to make droping items vanish or not appear?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

What it they accidentally drop something?

Anyway, look in the drop item packet (87), you’ll find it there.
